titleStmt.title: Roma ruens. Dagon falling before the Arke, or, The glory of Christ over-shadowing all other glories. / As it was delivered in a sermon before. the right Honourable Lord Major, and the right worshipful aldermen his brethren, at Mercers Chappel. By Nicholas Rust, chaplaine to the right Honourable Lord Major. Magna veritas & prævalet.
titleStmt.author: Rust, Nicholas, b. 1617 or 18.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black-spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black-spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls
